name: universal-converter
description: Convert just about anything to anything else.
author: Yanick Rochon <yanick.rochon@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:copy-files
scripts.build:cjs: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel --config-file babel.config.js ./src --out-dir ./build --ignore ./test
scripts.build:esm: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel --config-file babel.config.js ./src --out-dir ./build/esm --ignore ./test
scripts.build:es: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel --config-file babel.config.js ./src --out-dir ./build/es --ignore ./test
scripts.build:umd: npx cross-env BABEL_ENV=production-umd npx rollup -c scripts/rollup.config.js
scripts.release: npm run build && npm publish build --tag latest
